org.mongojack.internal.util

Class JacksonAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mongojack.internal.util.JacksonAccessor

  • public class JacksonAccessor
extends Object
    Accesses things in Jackson that usually aren't accessible. Here be dragons.
